creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
The file src/webapp/lenya/pubs/default/usecase-bxe.xmap is used to configure the
config file for bitflux. The config file is not properly setup because a static
path is used for the validation file instead of the path defined in module.xconf:

<map:parameter name="BX_validationfile"
 
value="{request:contextPath}/{page-envelope:publication-id}/{page-envelope:area}/schemas/{page-envelope:document-type}.rng"/>

This way, the rng file can't be placed in the module context.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: How can we test this bug?

text:
I guess this has been fixed.

modules/bxe/sitemap.xmap:
